scripts.build: nodejs ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js --debug public/js/app.js > public/js/bundle.js && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs www/assets/plugins/jquery-2.1.1.min.js www/assets/plugins/jquery.isotope.js www/assets/plugins/masonry.js www/assets/plugins/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.min.js www/assets/plugins/magnific-popup/jquery.magnific-popup.min.js www/assets/plugins/owl-carousel/owl.carousel.min.js www/assets/plugins/knob/js/jquery.knob.js www/assets/plugins/flexslider/jquery.flexslider-min.js www/assets/plugins/revolution-slider/js/jquery.themepunch.plugins.min.js www/assets/plugins/revolution-slider/js/jquery.themepunch.revolution.min.js www/assets/plugins/layerslider/js/layerslider_pack.js www/assets/plugins/feedEk/js/FeedEk.js www/assets/js/revolution_slider.js  www/assets/js/scripts.js www/assets/js/xj-tagger.js -o www/assets/js/all.js --preamble '/** Copyright 2014 XinnamonJ Inc. */'
